de.cocolab.reuse
Class Global

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--de.cocolab.reuse.Global
public class Global
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides a convenient way to have one global instance of each of Errors and IdentTable for simple Cocktail applications. Example: 

      Ident id = Global.idents.makeIdent(aString);
      Global.errors.message("Undefined identifier", Errors.Error, pos, id);

Version:
$Id: $
